channel.title: Build-O-Mania
channel.description: I was waiting for the BM since 2007 (but I wasn't registering on the forums). But here is the question, if somebody of the developers still have some of the old alpha/beta builds, maybe he will upload it? BM is now released, there is no a reason to hide information about the game.

item.title: Build-O-Mania
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I think the devs have said in the past that they’ve deleted previous builds when new ones became “official” milestones because to keep all the builds would be an extraordinary waste of drive space and/or resources.

Read full topic

item.title: Build-O-Mania
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
It’s… not very buggy at all, actually. Surprisingly flawless for the first release of a mod; usually there’s a major crash at a specific point or terrible framerate issues or go knows what else.

Read full topic

item.title: Build-O-Mania
item.dc:creator: Dimak
item.description:
The situation with this game is simmilar to S.T.A.L.K.E.R, both of the games took a lot of time to release, but after stalker’s release, developers have released some of the alpha/beta, laggy, unstable builds.

Read full topic

item.title: Build-O-Mania
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
it would be fun to see how incomplete and buggy the game was in 2009 when they were still trying to release that year, but I would be happy to get a few comparison screens that we haven’t seen outside of the atomic leak.

Read full topic

item.title: Build-O-Mania
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Eh, I don’t really see a point. We have plenty of beta screenshots and videos as it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Build-O-Mania
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I’m sure they won’t do that.
